mapper.update:
update TFR.T_OPT_BILLING_PLATFORM
FORECAST_QUANTITY_ID = #{forecastQuantityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BELONG_ORG_CODE = #{belongOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGION = #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RELEVANT_ORG_CODE = #{relevantOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BILLING_SALES_DISTRICT = #{billingSalesDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BILLING_SALES_DEPARTMENT = #{billingSalesDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BILLING_WEIGHT = #{billingWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BILLING_VOLUME = #{billingVolume,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BILLING_QTY = #{billingQty,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
GPS_ENABLED_RES_WEIGHT = #{gpsEnabledResWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GPS_ENABLED_RES_VOLUME = #{gpsEnabledResVolume,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GPS_ENABLED_RES_QTY = #{gpsEnabledResQty,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
PRECISION_IFS_WEIGHT = #{precisionIfsWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRECISION_IFS_VOLUME = #{precisionIfsVolume,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRECISION_IFS_QTY = #{precisionIfsQty,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
EXPRESS_WEIGHT = #{expressWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EXPRESS_VOLUME = #{expressVolume,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EXPRESS_QTY = #{expressQty,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
STATISTICS_TIME = #{statisticsTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where BILLING_ID = #{billingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TFR.T_OPT_BILLING_PLATFORM set FORECAST_QUANTITY_ID = #{forecastQuantityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BELONG_ORG_CODE = #{belongOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGION = #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RELEVANT_ORG_CODE = #{relevantOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BILLING_SALES_DISTRICT = #{billingSalesDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BILLING_SALES_DEPARTMENT = #{billingSalesDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BILLING_WEIGHT = #{billingWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BILLING_VOLUME = #{billingVolume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BILLING_QTY = #{billingQty,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, GPS_ENABLED_RES_WEIGHT = #{gpsEnabledResWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GPS_ENABLED_RES_VOLUME = #{gpsEnabledResVolume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GPS_ENABLED_RES_QTY = #{gpsEnabledResQty,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, PRECISION_IFS_WEIGHT = #{precisionIfsWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRECISION_IFS_VOLUME = #{precisionIfsVolume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRECISION_IFS_QTY = #{precisionIfsQty,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, EXPRESS_WEIGHT = #{expressWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EXPRESS_VOLUME = #{expressVolume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EXPRESS_QTY = #{expressQty,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, STATISTICS_TIME = #{statisticsTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where BILLING_ID = #{billingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select BILLING_SALES_DISTRICT, Sum(BILLING_WEIGHT) BILLING_WEIGHT, Sum(BILLING_VOLUME) BILLING_VOLUME, Sum(BILLING_QTY) BILLING_QTY, Sum(GPS_ENABLED_RES_WEIGHT) GPS_ENABLED_RES_WEIGHT, Sum(GPS_ENABLED_RES_VOLUME) GPS_ENABLED_RES_VOLUME, Sum(GPS_ENABLED_RES_QTY) GPS_ENABLED_RES_QTY, Sum(PRECISION_IFS_WEIGHT) PRECISION_IFS_WEIGHT, Sum(PRECISION_IFS_VOLUME) PRECISION_IFS_VOLUME, Sum(PRECISION_IFS_QTY) PRECISION_IFS_QTY, Sum(EXPRESS_WEIGHT) EXPRESS_WEIGHT, Sum(EXPRESS_VOLUME) EXPRESS_VOLUME, Sum(EXPRESS_QTY) EXPRESS_QTY from TFR.T_OPT_BILLING_PLATFORM
GROUP BY BILLING_SALES_DISTRICT
